messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

re missing for date period re for date period hi added advise if there something different you or we can order sort thank you lead sent friday re for date period hi think have managed sort out problematic periods although what worked correct period let enter either or without error but worked says approved by deleting entered value for entirely but saying approved period found after much trial error only way could get period submit like th was delete everything entered but saying approved period cannot get period submit matter what try please example pasted image received when trying submit with any entered values existing any periods regards sent re for date period dear please below print screen with your cards for month card for period public holiday please go manage cards access card by clicking date log line for monday for public holiday by using code click next submit also please submit other two card entered status same way by clicking them next submit please hesitate contact if you need further assistance have kind regards assistant sent thursday for date period hello line manager being requested for dated was before fusion went can you please tell how clear message profile or what fusion thanks
